sentences.en: A schoolboy miraculously survived a 25 000 - volt electric shock.
sentences.cn: 一名男学生在遭受2.5万伏的电击后奇迹般地活了下来.

sentences.en: After all he is still a schoolboy.
As a schoolboy, he showed every sign of genius.
sentences.cn: 当他还是个小学生的时候, 就显示出了天资聪慧.

sentences.en: Bob is a fine type of schoolboy.
He dug his toe into a drift, like a schoolboy.
sentences.cn: 他象小学里的男孩一样,把鞋子尖一下子扎进了雪堆.

sentences.en: He was an atypical English schoolboy.
sentences.cn: 他跟一般的英国男学生不太一样。

sentences.en: His disagreements are not ordinary schoolboy fights.
sentences.cn: 他可不一样,不是一般小学生打架.

sentences.en: I'm as happy as an angel, I'm as merry as a schoolboy.
sentences.cn: 我像天使一样快乐我个小男生一样幸福.

sentences.en: Less than the dust, the schoolboy murmured.
sentences.cn: 那学生灰溜溜, 怯生生地低声道.

sentences.en: Science teacher James Wood was sacked for slapping a schoolboy.
sentences.cn: 理科教师詹姆斯·伍德因为掌掴一名男生而被开除。

sentences.en: The schoolboy made a face at his teacher's back.
sentences.cn: 那个男生对着教师的背后做个鬼脸.

sentences.en: The young schoolboy can not understand the allusive conversation of intellectual men.
sentences.cn: 这个年轻的学生听不懂文人们引经据典的谈话.

sentences.en: There is still much of the schoolboy in him.
There was a hint of schoolboy shyness in his explanation.
sentences.cn: 他的解释中带有一丝学生的羞涩。

sentences.en: While dressing, he capered and clowned like a schoolboy.
sentences.cn: 他一边穿, 一边象个学生似的蹦蹦跳跳地扮演起小丑来.
